channel.title: Comments on: G5 Raises $76 million Led by Peak Equity Partners

item.title: By: Want to Work in Tech in Bend? G5 Hiring for 9 Positions | StartupBend

item.description: […] marketing for real estate companies via its G5 Marketing Cloud platform. The company raised $76 million last year to help accelerate the development and growth of its marketing platform and buy out some of its early investors. Pennsylvania-based Peak Equity Ventures led the round, […]
